item.text: In this consent, which is TRUE?

option.valueString: You agreed that you could be contacted in the future.
You agreed to call us with yearly updates.
You agreed to send us monthly lists of your child's medications.

item.text: Which of the following is TRUE?

option.valueString: This study will store your child's social web data (e.g., Facebook, Twitter) with your permission, along with your child's health record data.
This study will post your child's electronic health data on Twitter.
This study will share your child's Twitter data with insurers.

item.text: Which of the following is FALSE?

option.valueString: We will use your child's donated saliva sample for DNA (genetic code) sequencing.
We will share your child's DNA data with your child's doctor.
You will get a copy of all your child's genetic data obtained from sequencing your child's DNA.

item.text: Which of the following is FALSE?

option.valueString: You can download all stored data you provide us with and send it wherever you wish.
You and your child can withdraw from the study whenever you wish.
Although we will do our best to safeguard the data you provide us with, there is always a small chance that a hacker might access the data illegally.
Data from this study will go into your child's medical record.
